description: Spearheaded the development of a mobile application from concept to deployment, ensuring high performance on both iOS and Android using Flutter. Integrated key features, optimized app scalability, and implemented CI/CD pipelines for efficient releases.
title: Senior Mobile Application Developer

description: Lead the design, development, and deployment of mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms using Flutter. Integrate third-party APIs and services to support core app functionality.
title: Team Leader | Senior Mobile Application Developer
